name: Who Killed The Coffee Pot?
description:
Game Made during the first ever Barcelona King Jam by Royalteam.

Grab your pen and paper! Take notes and discover who killed the Coffee Pot.

You get a very limited time to interrogate and look for hidden clues in the suspects.
There's two rounds of interrogations. At the end of each one you'll have to relate clues with suspects.

Replay the game to get the full story!

Members:
